SummaryEnglish: Haruka Hanito is a second year high school student attending Hinomori Gakuen. He belongs to the drama club and wrote the script for the stage to be presented at the school festival. A monster called a sinful beast appears in the city of the forest at night where Haruka lives and attacks people and the city. However, there was a Heart Princess in Yonomori City who fights against the beast of sin.
SummaryJapanese: 羽人はるかは日ノ森学園に通う高校2年生です。彼は演劇部に所属し、学園祭で発表する予定の舞台の脚本を書いた。遥が住む夜の森の街に、罪深い獣と呼ばれる怪物が現れ、人々と街を襲う。しかし、よのもり市には罪の獣と戦うハートプリンセスがいた。
Aliases: シックスハートプリンセス
